channel.title: Client run error
channel.description:
Hey for some reason whenever I run my DeathlyPVPZ V3 client I always get this one error and the client pops up but it says "Connection Error. Retrying in 10 seconds." Please help. Here's what the compiler says:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:/Deathlypvpz V3/Data/Maps/mapConfig.txt <The sy stem cannot find the patch specified> at java.io.FileInputStream.open<Native Method> at java.io.FileInputStream.<init><FileInputStream.java:138> at java.io.FileInputStream.<init><FileInputStream.java:97> at java.io.FileReader.<init><FileReader.java:58> at client.setNewMaps<client.java:172> at client.startUp<client.java:8298> at RSApplet.run<RSApplet.java:84> at client.run<client.java:5287> at java.lang.Thread.run<Thread.java:724>

item.title: Client run error
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I don’t think this error will cause the error you’re getting. It’s just saying it can’t find the file.

The retrying error is caused by the absence of something in the cache, or the cache not being in the correct location. Make sure that the cache is in the place that matches your signlink cache location.

Read full topic
